predicate.note: Frames file for 'perch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 47.6, 9.2, 50; Framenet entry Placing.

example.name: passive
example.text: But the greatest damage was visited on buildings and roadways perched [*] upon landfill, as were the Marina District of San Francisco and the Bay Bridge -- two areas of maximum devastation.
example.arg: as were the Marina District of San Francisco and the Bay Bridge -- two areas of maximum devastation

example.name: args 0 and 1 merged
example.text: John's parakeet perched on the end of his nose.
